deal.title: Universal Studios Hollywood | Skip the Line Options | Wizarding World of Harry Potter & Super Nintendo World
deal.finePrint:
❕ Purchase: All Sales Final. Limit 10 per person.
✘ Restrictions: Valid at Universal Studios Hollywood in Los Angeles, CA only; ticket not valid at Universal Orlando. Ticket may not be altered, copied, transferred, or resold. Unauthorized duplication or sale of ticket may prevent admittance. Photocopies not accepted. Ticket cannot be combined with other offers, separately ticketed events, discounts, or tours. Parking not included. Please see tickets for all details. If you are purchasing as a gift, please use the recipients name(s) at the Reservation Details step. For 2-Day tickets: Your first visit is valid on the selected date of purchase, and your second visit can be used anytime within 90 days of that first visit - no blockout dates apply.
➪ Additional information: For safety information and assumption of risk, click here. Universal reserves right to revoke license granted by this ticket. Park, rides/shows/attractions, entertainment, experience details and/or access to event may be restricted/unavailable due to capacity/closures/other factors and benefits/restrictions subject to change without notice. Unused visits are forfeited.
deal.highlightsHtml: Universal Studios Hollywood offers movie-themed rides, live shows, and behind-the-scenes experiences with familiar characters. Enjoy thrills, mischief, and nonstop fun for everyone!
deal.pitchHtml:
Highlights

  • Get discount tickets for full-day access to Universal Studios Hollywood in Los Angeles, California.

  • Dive into immersive worlds where your favorite entertainment, movies, and television shows become a vibrant reality.

  • Explore Wizarding World of Harry Potter, Super Nintendo World, and conquer groundbreaking rides with state-of-the-art technology and other attractions.

  • Go behind the scenes on the World-Famous Studio Tour, exploring real film sets and thrilling movie experiences like King Kong 360 3-D.

  • Choose Universal Express for priority access to maximize your day by skipping lines at participating rides and shows.

What To Expect

•
Harry Potter and the Forbidden Journey: Make your way through Hogwarts™ School of Witchcraft and Wizardry before soaring above the castle grounds on a thrilling adventure with Harry Potter™ and his friends. Groundbreaking, state-of-the-art technology (and a little magic) creates a one-of-a-kind ride.
•
TRANSFORMERS: The Ride-3D: Megatron and his villainous Decepticons want to rule Earth. Board your NEST vehicle and join Optimus Prime and Bumblebee in an explosive fight to save mankind in this ultra-immersive thrill ride.
•
Jurassic World - The Ride: Prepare yourself for the evolution of Jurassic World - The Ride. Enter an immersive land and come face-to-face with the Indominus rex, then get caught in the fray as she’s confronted by the Tyrannosaurus rex.
•
SUPER NINTENDO WORLD™: SUPER NINTENDO WORLD™ takes you into the world of Super Mario. Battle Team Bowser on the groundbreaking Mario Kart ride, dine at Toadstool Cafe, and level up with merch at the 1-UP Factory store at Universal Studios Hollywood.
•
Mario Kart™: Bowser’s Challenge: Battle Team Bowser on iconic Mario Kart™ courses alongside Mario, Luigi, and Princess Peach. Collect coins and throw shells to win the Golden Cup in this cutting-edge ride at SUPER NINTENDO WORLD™.
•
Despicable Me Minion Mayhem: Experience Despicable Me Minion Mayhem as you join Gru, his daughters, and the mischievous Minions on a heartwarming and thrilling ride.
•
The World-Famous Studio Tour: Go behind the scenes to see where your favorite films and shows were filmed and enjoy immersive experiences like King Kong 360 3-D.
•
Universal CityWalk – Entertainment, dining, and shopping district: For food, fun, and all kinds of awesome, Universal CityWalk has everything you’re craving—from sweet treats to tasty bites, Universal Cinema, and more.

Plan Your Visit

  • Operating HoursUniversal Studios Hollywood is open 365 days a year! Their daily hours of park operation vary by day and by season. Park hours are typically posted 4 weeks in advance and are subject to change. For the most up-to-date park hours, please check their Theme Park Hours calendar here. https://www.universalstudioshollywood.com/web/en/us/calendar-and-hours
  • Ticket ValidityGeneral Admission and Universal Express tickets are valid only on the selected date of purchase. The 12-Month Silver Annual Pass is valid for 12 months from your first visit date.
Insider Tips!
- Arrive 30 minutes before opening to hit Harry Potter first
- Download Universal Studios app for real-time wait times
- Weekday visits average 40% shorter wait times than weekends
- Express Pass most valuable on Saturdays & summer months

Ticket Options

1-Day General Admission

Experience a full day of cinematic thrills with general admission, granting you access to the World-Famous Studio Tour, rides, shows, and attractions. Unleash your imagination where your favorite entertainment becomes real. Valid on selected date only.

2-Day General Admission

Experience two full days of cinematic thrills. Enjoy access to the World-Famous Studio Tour, rides, shows, and immersive attractions where your favorite entertainment comes to life. Your first visit is valid on the selected date of purchase, and your second visit can be used anytime within 90 days of that first visit - no blockout dates apply.

1-Day Universal Express Admission

Skip the line! Maximize your adventure with a full day of thrills and receive one-time priority access to each ride, show, and attraction. Enjoy shorter wait times and make the most of your visit! Includes 1-Day Admission. Valid on selected date only. Does not apply to food and retail locations or non-seated shows. Restrictions apply.

12-Months + 3 Months FREE Silver Annual Pass

Enjoy more than a year of fun with over 275 dates of availability, including exclusive Pass Member benefits like invitations to special events and previews. Perfect for repeat visits and true movie enthusiasts.

The pass must be activated on or before the date on the ticket. After purchase, you must select your first visit date and activate the ticket prior to arrival. Purchasable through April 8. The pass is valid for 15 months from the first visit date. Reservations may be required; additional restrictions may apply.

Blockout dates apply for return visits:


See Website for blockout dates past December 2026. Subject to Change.

PLUS: 10-15% discounts at participating CityWalk locations and discounted Halloween Horror Nights tickets.

How It Works

1. Grab the Deal

Buy your Groupon first!

2. Plan Your Visit!

Select your perfect day to go!

3. Redeem your Mobile Ticket

Scan your Groupon upon arrival.

4. Enjoy the Experience!

FAQs

What's the difference between General Admission and Express?

General Admission includes all rides with standard wait times (30-90 minutes). Express gives you ONE-TIME front-of-line access to each attraction, letting you experience 2-3X more in the same day.

Is parking included?

No, parking is $30-$50 (paid separately at the park). Arrive early or use the Metro Red Line to Universal City Station (free shuttle to park).

Can I use this ticket on any day?

Yes, select your visit date at checkout. Valid through April 2026. Express valid through May 2026.

Is food included?

No, but there are 15+ restaurants. Budget $15-40 per person for meals.

How long should I plan to stay?

Plan for a full 8-10 hour day. Park opens at 9-10 AM, depending on the season. With Express Pass, you can see everything in 6-7 hours.

Can I upgrade to Express at the park?

Yes, but it costs $80-120 more. Save money by buying an Express Pass now if you're visiting on a weekend or during peak season.

Will I receive actual tickets?

Yes, you'll receive a voucher to redeem for official Universal tickets. Print or show on phone at the gate.


Legal Information

HARRY POTTER and all related characters and elements © & ™ Warner Bros. Entertainment Inc. Publishing Rights © J.K. Rowling.

TRANSFORMERS and its logo and all related characters are trademarks of Hasbro and are used with permission. © 2025 Hasbro. © Nintendo. Nintendo trademarks are properties of Nintendo. © 2025 DreamWorks Animation LLC. Minions and all related elements and indicia TM & © 2025 Universal Studios. Jurassic World is a trademark and copyright of Universal Studios and Amblin Entertainment, Inc.

Prices, times, dates, entertainment, event and/or experience details are subject to changes and/or cancellation without notice.
